About.paragraph: I'm a full-stack web developer and recent grad from Lambda School. I started my journey into web development nearly a year ago and in that time I've had the opportunity to work with some wonderful people. Along the way I have developed a strong skillset spanning multiple disciplines and am excited to find my first opportunity in the industry where I intend to add value to a company.
